lines.text: Well, I don't know if that candle specifically was what caused it, but...
We can be pretty sure the guy by the door was <c=#FF0000>on fire</c> at some point. He's... pretty crispy.
Sure. That makes sense. But what’s that got to do with the statue?
Well, remember the spell description for <c=#0000FF>Flesh to Stone?</c> It backfires if the target has a <c=#FF00FF>status effect!</c>
‘’Burning’’ is a pretty classic status effect. Ask anyone.
...I don’t know about that. You don’t think he’d notice?
That the guy was on fire, and that the spell would backfire. Seems like the first thing you’d check if you wanted to cast something like that.
That’s true, but… maybe he wasn’t thinking of the non-magical fire as something that would count?
I mean, these guys are pretty inexperienced, judging by their library.
...All right, then. I’ll trust your judgment on this one.
